inputs.notes: Client reports sudden cost increase for LeadGen Nov campaign.

details.task: Prioritize and initiate an urgent review of the LeadGen Nov campaign, addressing the client's reported cost increase and the critical CPA of 25.0 (target 12.0).

plan.reason: Prioritize and initiate an urgent review of the LeadGen Nov campaign, addressing the client's reported cost increase and the critical CPA of 25.0 (target 12.0).

details.task: Conduct a deep dive into LeadGen Nov campaign creatives on Facebook to identify underperforming assets or those driving the sudden cost surge.

plan.reason: Conduct a deep dive into LeadGen Nov campaign creatives on Facebook to identify underperforming assets or those driving the sudden cost surge.

details.task: Audit all recent modifications to the LeadGen Nov campaign (e.g., bidding, targeting, budget) to pinpoint any changes contributing to the cost increase.

plan.reason: Audit all recent modifications to the LeadGen Nov campaign (e.g., bidding, targeting, budget) to pinpoint any changes contributing to the cost increase.

details.task: Provide an immediate update to the client, confirming receipt of their report and outlining the initial investigative steps being taken for LeadGen Nov.
